Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help

Package org.cougaar.tools.robustness.sensors

Class Summary
HbReq A Heartbeat Request Relay, the Blackboard object that is passed between HeartbeatRequesterPlugin to HeartbeatServerPlugin.
HbReqContent An object to be passed along with a HbReq object between HeartbeatRequesterPlugin to HeartbeatServerPlugin containing additional content.
HbReqResponse The Response returned by the HeartbeatServerPlugin, containing the status.
Heartbeat A Heartbeat Relay, the Blackboard object that is generated by the HeartbeatServerPlugin in response to a HbReq from the HeartbeatRequesterPlugin.
HeartbeatEntry An Entry in the list of Heartbeats in the HeartbeatHealthReport.
HeartbeatHealthReport HealthReport with an associated list of monitored agents, time last msg was received, and whether that was in-spec or not, according to current HeartbeatRequests.
HeartbeatRequest A Plugin developer requests a Heartbeat by publishing a HeartbeatRequest on the blackboard of a local agent with HeartbeatRequesterPlugin loaded.
HeartbeatRequesterPlugin This Plugin receives HeartbeatRequests from the local Blackboard and sends HbReqs to the target agent's HeartbeatServerPlugin.
HeartbeatServerPlugin This Plugin requests for heartbeats (HbReq) and responds with HeartbeatRequest.ACCEPTED or HeartbeatRequest.REFUSED.
Ping A Ping Relay, the Blackboard object that is passed between PingRequesterPlugin to PingServerPlugin.
PingContent An object to be passed along with a Ping object between PingRequesterPlugin to PingServerPlugin containing additional content.
PingDomain Deprecated. Use SensorDomain instead.
PingFactory Deprecated. Use SensorFactory instead.
PingRequest A Plugin developer requests a ping by publishing a PingRequest on the blackboard of a local agent with PingRequesterPlugin loaded.
PingRequesterPlugin This Plugin receives PingRequests from the local Blackboard and sends Pings to the target agent's PingServerPlugin.
PingServerPlugin This Plugin receives and echoes Pings that originate from the PingRequesterPlugin.
PingTesterPlugin This Plugin tests PingRequester and PingServerPlugin.
SensorDomain Domain for Sensors, named "sensors".
SensorFactory Factory for PingRequests & HeartbeatRequests.
